tweets.author: みーすー
tweets.text:
My friend from Fukuoka sent me Subaru-kun   
He vividly remembers the location shoot from 9 years ago, and since it was so fun, he wants to call Ryusei Maruyama back again  
He also talked about his chats with Yuzo Hyakuyama-san  
And about the real, unfiltered Shibuya Subaru

thread_replies.author: duran4
thread_replies.text:
Uh-oh   
Is it today's broadcast?  
Can I watch it on TVer?

thread_replies.author: みーすー
thread_replies.text:
そうです
福岡の方の朝の情報番組に出てて
TVerは調べてないですが、ないんじゃないかなぁ？と

thread_replies.author: marusuba.313
thread_replies.text:
I'm sorry for quoting without permission.  
I checked for a catch-up stream but couldn't find one, so I was glad to see this image. Thank you very much.

thread_replies.author: みーすー
thread_replies.text: アルバムとツアーの告知だったんですけど、すばるくんが丸ちゃんとの福岡での思い出を楽しかったって言って今でもずっと覚えててなんかいいなあって思いました（寒いなかのロケとは言ってましたw）

thread_replies.author: あすあす
thread_replies.text: 見せてくれてありがとう〜

thread_replies.author: 横山㌠@SUPER
thread_replies.text: I want you to live with me just like this until we're 100.

thread_replies.author: ゆり@J事務所
thread_replies.text: Yokoyama-san, forced to run again right after New Year's lolololololololo

thread_replies.author: むらし@※
thread_replies.text:
Murakami-kun's kanji of the year: "Run"  
Reason: I was just so worried about Yokoyama-san's marathon  

Haa~~~~~

thread_replies.author: らあゆ
thread_replies.text:
Murakami Nobu's lecture was seriously so much fun, and above all, his style was insanely on point and he looked so cool.

I was like, yeah, he's an idol after all, and I was genuinely moved, plus his talking skills are amazing too, and the 90 minutes flew by in an instant.

thread_replies.author: ゆり@J事務所
thread_replies.text: While there are parts that can't be helped since it was an accident during filming, it hurts to think that Yokoyama-san is probably the one who's most frustrated about it ending up shelved, even though it was the first time we got invited to Doki Doki GP.

thread_replies.author: ハル
thread_replies.text: I think the worst one is people who love Yokote's variety content, so I hate it because they'd probably blame themselves like "as long as I don't get hurt..."

thread_replies.author: Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE
thread_replies.text:
This war is an inevitable conclusion...
One that is only a matter of time.

Be the Monarch of Shadows and....
ARISE!

thread_replies.author: k
thread_replies.text:
I guess it means they broke a bone with a massive spin, huh...

Yokoyama-san is too worrying   
Please rest slowly and take care of yourself

thread_replies.author: ちゃ
thread_replies.text: It's not like "I caused Mr. Yokoyama to get injured" or something. On top of that, they're planning to continue the show as usual, which is just not funny.

thread_replies.author: はしの
thread_replies.text:
I hope Mr. Yokoyama gets better as soon as possible...  
I hope that program, which suddenly surprises, drops, or tests people, disappears soon...

thread_replies.author: みずき
thread_replies.text:
Forcing unsolicited opinions on marriage or  
causing broken bones—what the hell is this, Fuji TV...?  
If you're going to make a show, please make one that's fun for both the performers and the viewers...  
Hoping that Yokoyama-kun's injury heals completely without issue.

I was like, yeah, he's an idol after all, and I was genuinely moved, plus his talking skills are amazing too, and the 90 minutes flew by in an instant.

thread_replies.author: ミロ美
thread_replies.text: 私も講義聞いてみたかったです。

tweets.author: ミロ美
tweets.text: 私も講義聞いてみたかったです。
